posts.postText: Detective's weapon, has 2 shots. If you hit an inno, it confirms them, if you hit a tator, it explodes! :D
It's called the golden gun; It has 1 shot and we don't have it because it's lame.
How pissed would you be if you got killed 3 seconds into the round because of it?
